Name: 11-headed hydra
Description: A strange reptilian hybrid with eleven smouldering heads.

Name: 2-headed hydra
Description: A strange reptilian hybrid with two heads§ guarding its hoard.

Name: 4-headed hydra
Description: A strange reptilian hybrid with four heads§ guarding its hoard.

Name: 9-headed hydra
Description: A strange reptilian hybrid with nine smouldering heads.

Name: Abhoth§ Source of Uncleanness
Description: A greyish horrid mass§ which quobbs and quivers spawning monstrosities.

Name: Abyss worm mass
Description: Even more disgusting dark worms§ their essence that of unbeing.

Name: Acidic cytoplasm
Description: A disgusting animated blob of destruction. Flee its gruesome hunger!

Name: Aether hound
Description: A shifting§ swirling form. It seems to be all colours and sizes and shapes§ though the dominant form is that of a huge dog. You feel very uncertain all of a sudden.

Name: Aether vortex
Description: An awesome vortex of pure magic§ power radiates from its frame.

Name: Agent of the black market
Description: He 'finds' new wares for the Black Market. From unwary adventurers...

Name: Aimless looking merchant
Description: The typical ponce around town§ with purse jingling§ and looking for more amulets of adornment to buy.

Name: Air elemental
Description: It is a towering tornado of winds.

Name: Air hound
Description: Swirling vapours surround this beast as it floats towards you§ seemingly walking on air. Noxious gases sting your throat.

Name: Air spirit
Description: A whirlwind of sentient air.

Name: Alberich§ the Nibelung King
Description: Made invisible with his magic§ the greedy dwarf plots for world domination through his riches.

Name: Algroth
Description: A powerful troll form. Venom drips from its needlelike claws.

Name: Ancalagon the Black
Description: 'Rushing Jaws' is his name§ and death is his game. No dragon of the brood of Glaurung can match him.

Name: Ancient black dragon
Description: A huge draconic form. Pools of acid melt the floor around it.

Name: Ancient blue dragon
Description: A huge draconic form. Lightning crackles along its length.

Name: Ancient bronze dragon
Description: A huge draconic form enveloped in a cascade of colour.

Name: Ancient gold dragon
Description: A huge draconic form wreathed in a nimbus of light.

Name: Ancient green dragon
Description: A huge draconic form enveloped in clouds of poisonous vapour.

Name: Ancient multi-hued dragon
Description: A huge draconic form. Many colours ripple down its massive frame. Few live to see another.

Name: Ancient red dragon
Description: A huge draconic form. Wisps of smoke steam from its nostrils and the extreme heat surrounding it makes you gasp for breath.

Name: Ancient white dragon
Description: A huge draconic form. Frost covers it from head to tail.

Name: Anti-paladin
Description: An embodiment of all the cardinal vices§ he beholds you scornfully.

Name: Apprentice cultist
Description: He is tripping over his fetishes.

Name: Apprentice mage
Description: He is leaving behind a trail of dropped spell components.

Name: Apprentice ranger
Description: An agile hunter§ ready and relaxed.

Name: Apprentice warrior
Description: He looks inexperienced but tough.

Name: Atlach-Nacha§ the Spider God
Description: '...there was a kind of face on the squat ebon body§ low down amid the several-jointed legs. The face peered up with a weird expression of doubt and inquiry...'

Name: Auto-roller
Description: It looks like a huge spiked roller§ moving on its own towards you.

Name: Avatar of Nyarlathotep
Description: The Crawling Chaos with 1000 forms. Nyarlathotep is amused at yourpuny attempts to kill him§ and will keep coming back for another go§ until he gets bored with the game.

Name: Azathoth§ The Daemon Sultan
Description: 'That last amorphous blight of nethermost confusion which blasphemes and bubbles at the centre of all infinity - the boundless daemon sultan Azathoth§ whose name no lips dare speak aloud§ and who gnaws hungrily in inconceivable§ unlighted chambers beyond time amidst the muffled§ maddening beating of vile drums and the thin monotonous whine of accursed flutes' - H.P.Lovecraft§ 'The Dream Quest of Unknown Kadath'

Name: Azog§ King of the Uruk-Hai
Description: He is also known as the King of Khazad-dum. His ego is renowned to be bigger than his head.

Name: Baby black dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales a dull black.

Name: Baby blue dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales a pale blue.

Name: Baby green dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales a sickly green.

Name: Baby multi-hued dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales shimmering with a hint of colour.

Name: Baby red dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales a pale red.

Name: Baby white dragon
Description: This hatchling dragon is still soft§ its eyes unaccustomed to light and its scales a pale white.

Name: Balance drake
Description: A mighty dragon§ the balance drake seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance§ and despises your feeble efforts to destroy evil.

Name: Balrog
Description: It is a massive humanoid demon wreathed in flames.

Name: Bandit
Description: He is after your cash!

Name: Banshee
Description: It is a ghostly woman's form that wails mournfully.

Name: Baphomet§ the Minotaur Lord
Description: A fearsome bull-headed demon§ Baphomet swings a mighty axe as he curses all that defy him.

Name: Baron of hell
Description: A minor demon lord with a goat's head§ tough to kill.

Name: Barrow wight
Description: It is a ghostly nightmare of a entity.

Name: Basilisk
Description: An evil reptile whose eyes stare deeply at you and your soul starts to wilt!

Name: Bast§ Goddess of Cats
Description: She looks like a mortal female with a cat's head.

Name: Battle scarred veteran
Description: He doesn't take to strangers kindly.

Name: Beholder
Description: A disembodied eye§ surrounded by twelve smaller eyes on stalks.

Name: Black harpy
Description: A woman's face on the body of a vicious black bird.

Name: Black knight
Description: He is a figure encased in deep black plate armour; he looks at you menacingly.

Name: Black mamba
Description: It has glistening black skin§ a sleek body and highly venomous fangs.

Name: Black naga
Description: A large black serpent's body with a female torso.

Name: Black ogre
Description: A massive orc-like figure with black skin and powerful arms.

Name: Black ooze
Description: It is a strangely moving puddle.

Name: Black orc
Description: He is a large orc with powerful arms and deep black skin.

Name: Black pudding
Description: A lump of rotting black flesh that slurrrrrrrps across the dungeon floor.

Name: Black reaver
Description: Clicking metal steps announce the arrival of this creature§ A powerful undead warrior possessed by a major demon§ it is unstoppable.

Name: Black wraith
Description: A figure that seems made of void§ its strangely human shape is cloaked in shadow. It reaches out at you.

Name: Blink dog
Description: A strange magical member of the canine race§ its form seems to shimmer and fade in front of your very eyes.

Name: Blinking dot
Description: Is it there or is it not?

Name: Bloodshot eye
Description: A disembodied eye§ bloodshot and nasty.

Name: Bloodshot icky thing
Description: It is a strange§ slimy§ icky creature.

Name: Blue dragon bat
Description: It is a glowing blue bat with a sharp tail.

Name: Blue icky thing
Description: It is a strange§ slimy§ icky creature§ with rudimentary intelligence§ but evil cunning. It hungers for food§ and you look tasty.

Name: Blue jelly
Description: It's a large pile of pulsing blue flesh.

Name: Blue ooze
Description: It's blue and it's oozing.

Name: Blue worm mass
Description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

Name: Blue yeek
Description: A small humanoid figure.

Name: Bodak
Description: It is a humanoid form composed of flames and hatred.

Name: Boldor§ King of the Yeeks
Description: A great yeek§ powerful in magic and sorcery§ but a yeek all the same.

Name: Bolg§ Son of Azog
Description: A large and powerful orc. He looks just like his daddy. He is tall and fast§ but fortunately blessed with orcish brains.

Name: Bone golem
Description: A skeletal form§ black as night§ constructed from the bones of its previous victims and inhabited by the soul of a lich of great power.

Name: Brigand
Description: He is eyeing your purse suspiciously.

Name: Brodda§ the Easterling
Description: A nasty piece of work§ Brodda picks on defenseless women and children.

Name: Brown mold
Description: A strange brown growth on the dungeon floor.

Name: Brown yeek
Description: It is a strange small humanoid.

Name: Byakhee
Description: Hybrid demon birds: 'not altogether crows§ nor moles§ nor buzzards§ nor ants§ nor decomposed human beings...'

Name: Cantoras§ the Skeletal Lord
Description: A legion of evil undead druj animating the skeleton of a once mighty sorcerer. His power is devastating and his speed unmatched in the underworld. Flee his wrath!

Name: Carcharoth§ the Jaws of Thirst
Description: The first guard of Angband§ Carcharoth§ also known as 'The Red Maw'§ is the largest wolf to ever walk the earth. He is highly intelligent and a deadly opponent in combat.

Name: Carrion crawler
Description: A hideous centipede covered in slime and with glowing tentacles around its head.

Name: Cave lizard
Description: It is an armoured lizard with a powerful bite.

Name: Cave ogre
Description: A giant orc-like figure with an awesomely muscled frame.

Name: Cave orc
Description: He is often found in huge numbers in deep caves.

Name: Cave spider
Description: It is a black spider that moves in fits and starts.

Name: Cave troll
Description: He is a vicious monster§ feared for his ferocity.

Name: Chaos drake
Description: A dragon twisted by the forces of chaos. It seems first ugly§ then fair§ as its form shimmers and changes in front of your eyes.

Name: Chaos ghost
Description: An almost life-like creature which is nothing more than a phantom created by the chaos.

Name: Chaos hound
Description: A constantly changing canine form§ this hound rushes towards you as if expecting mayhem and chaos ahead. It appears to have an almost kamikaze relish for combat. You suspect all may not be as it seems.

Name: Chaos master
Description: An adept of chaos§ feared for his skill of invoking raw chaos.

Name: Chaos shapechanger
Description: A vaguely humanoid form constantly changing its appearance.

Name: Chaos spawn
Description: It has two eyestalks and a large central eye. Its gaze can kill.

Name: Chaos tile
Description: It is a floor tile corrupted by chaos.

Name: Chaos vortex
Description: Void§ nothingness§ spinning destructively.

Name: Chimera
Description: It is a strange concoction of lion§ dragon and goat. It looks very odd but very avoidable.

Name: Chthonian
Description: A huge subterranean worm whose body ends in a mass of groping tentacles.

Name: Clear hound
Description: A completely translucent hound.

Name: Clear icky thing
Description: It is a smallish§ slimy§ icky§ blobby creature.

Name: Clear worm mass
Description: It is a disgusting mass of poisonous worms.

Name: Cloud giant
Description: It is a twenty foot tall giant wreathed in clouds.

Name: Clubber demon
Description: It is a demon swinging wildly with two clubs. Not even remotely subtle.

Name: Colbran
Description: A man-shaped form of living lightning§ sparks and shocks crackle all over this madly capering figure§ as it leaps and whirls around and about you.

Name: Cold hound
Description: A hound as tall as a man§ this creature appears to be composed of angular planes of ice. Cold radiates from it and freezes your breath in the air.

Name: Cold vortex
Description: A twisting whirlpool of frost.

Name: Colossus
Description: An enormous construct resembling a titan made from stone. It strides purposefully towards you§ swinging its slow fists with earth-shattering power.

Name: Copperhead snake
Description: It has a copper head and sharp venomous fangs.

Name: Creeping adamantite coins
Description: It is a pile of coins§ slithering forward on thousands of tiny legs.

Name: Creeping copper coins
Description: It is a pile of coins.

Name: Creeping gold coins
Description: It is a pile of coins§ crawling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

Name: Creeping mithril coins
Description: It is a pile of coins§ shambling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

Name: Creeping silver coins
Description: It is a pile of coins§ crawling forward on thousands of tiny legs.

Name: Crypt creep
Description: Frightening skeletal figures in black robes.

Name: Crystal drake
Description: A dragon of strange crystalline form. Light shines through it§ dazzling your eyes with spectrums of colour.

Name: Cult high priest
Description: A dark priest of the highest order. Powerful and evil§ beware his many spells.

Name: Cult leader
Description: An evil priest§ dressed all in black. Deadly spells hit you at an alarming rate as his black spiked mace rains down Attack after Attack on your pitiful frame.

Name: Cultist
Description: A robed humanoid dedicated to his outer god.

Name: Daoloth
Description: 'Not shapeless§ but so complex that the eye could recognise no discernable shape.' J.Ramsey Campbell - 'The Render of the Veils'.

Name: Dark elven cultist
Description: A powerful dark elf§ with mighty nature-controlling enchantments.

Name: Dark elven demonologist
Description: A dark elven figure§ dressed all in black§ chanting curses and waiting to deliver your soul to hell.

Name: Dark elven lord
Description: A dark elven figure in armour and radiating evil power.

Name: Dark elven mage
Description: A dark elven figure§ dressed all in black§ hurling spells at you.

Name: Dark elven thaumaturge
Description: A dark elven figure§ dressed in deepest black. Power seems to crackle from her slender frame.

Name: Dark elven warlock
Description: A dark elven mage with spells of frightening destructive power.

Name: Dark elven warrior
Description: A dark elven figure in armour and ready with his sword.

Name: Dark young of Shub-Niggurath
Description: A black§ ropy§ slimy jelly tree-thing; an enormous writhing mass.

Name: Death drake
Description: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in darkness. You cannot make out its true form but you sense its evil.

Name: Death knight
Description: It is a humanoid form dressed in armour of an ancient form. From beneath its helmet§ eyes glow a baleful red and seem to pierce you like lances of fire.

Name: Death mold
Description: It is the epitome of all that is evil§ in a mold. Its lifeless form draws power from sucking the souls of those that approach it§ a nimbus of pure evil surrounds it. Luckily for you§ it can't move.

Name: Death quasit
Description: It is a demon of small stature§ but its armoured frame moves with lightning speed and its powers make it a tornado of death and destruction.

Name: Death sword
Description: A bloodthirsty blade lurking for prey. Beware!

Name: Death watch beetle
Description: It is a giant beetle that produces a chilling sound.

Name: Deep One
Description: A batrachian humanoid with large eyes and a scaly skin suggestive of fishskin§ hopping irregularly and casting spells with a croaking§ baying voice.

Name: Demonic quylthulg
Description: A pile of pulsing flesh that glows with an inner hellish fire. The world itself seems to cry out against it.

Name: Dhole
Description: A gigantic worm dripping with acid.

Name: Dimensional shambler
Description: A shabby humanoid with a wrinkled skin. It seems to shift in and out of existance as you watch.

Name: Disenchanter eye
Description: A disembodied eye§ crackling with magic.

Name: Disenchanter mold
Description: It is a strange glowing growth on the dungeon floor.

Name: Disenchanter worm mass
Description: It is a strange mass of squirming worms. Magical energy crackles around its disgusting form.

Name: Displacer beast
Description: It is a huge black panther§ clubbed tentacles sprouting from its shoulders.

Name: Doom drake
Description: Doom drakes are trained firedrakes§ always moving in pairs§ looking for a battle.

Name: Dracolich
Description: The skeletal form of a once-great dragon§ enchanted by magic most perilous. Its animated form strikes with speed and drains life from its prey to satisfy its hunger.

Name: Dracolisk
Description: A mixture of dragon and basilisk§ the dracolisk stares at you with deep piercing eyes§ its evil breath burning the ground where it stands.

Name: Draconic quylthulg
Description: It looks like it was once a dragon corpse§ now deeply infected with magical bacteria that make it pulse in a foul and degrading way.

Name: Dreadmaster
Description: It is an unlife of power almost unequaled. An affront to existence§ its very touch abuses and disrupts the flow of life§ and its unearthly limbs§ of purest black§ crush rock and flesh with ease.

Name: Drider
Description: A dark elven torso merged with the bloated form of a giant spider.

Name: Drolem
Description: A constructed dragon§ the drolem has massive strength. Powerful spells weaved during its creation make it a fearsome adversary. Its eyes show little intelligence§ but it has been instructed to destroy all it meets.

Name: Earth elemental
Description: It is a towering form composed of rock with fists of awesome power.

Name: Earth hound
Description: A beautiful crystalline shape does not disguise the danger this hound clearly presents. Your flesh tingles as it approaches.

Name: Earth spirit
Description: A whirling form of sentient rock.

Name: Elder thing
Description: It is barrel-shaped§ with horizontal arms and a starfish head.

Name: Emperor wight
Description: Your life force is torn from your body as this powerful unearthly being approaches.

Name: Enchantress
Description: This elusive female spellcaster has a special affinity for dragons§ whom she rarely fights without.

Name: Energy hound
Description: Saint Elmo's Fire forms a ghostly halo around this hound§ and sparks sting your fingers as energy builds up in the air around you.

Name: Energy vortex
Description: A shimmering tornado of air§ sparks crackle along its length.

Name: Eog golem
Description: It is a massive deep brown statue§ striding towards you with an all-too-familiar purpose. Your magic surprisingly feels much less powerful now.

Name: Ethereal dragon
Description: A huge dragon emanating from the elemental plains§ the ethereal dragon is a master of light and dark. Its form disappears from sight as it cloaks itself in unearthly shadows.

Name: Ethereal drake
Description: A dragon of elemental power§ with control over light and dark§ the ethereal drake's eyes glare with white hatred from the shadows.

Name: Eye druj
Description: A bloodshot eyeball floating in the air§ you'd be forgiven for assuming it harmless.

Name: Fafner the Dragon
Description: The mighty dragon of the Norse myth§ Fafner was a giant who slew his brother to win a treasure hoard§ and then transformed himself into a dragon§ greedily watching over his hoard.

Name: Fang§ Farmer Maggot's dog
Description: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot. It thinks you are stealing mushrooms.

Name: Farmer Maggot
Description: He's lost his dogs. He's had his mushrooms stolen. He's not a happy hobbit!

Name: Fasolt the Giant
Description: Big§ brawny§ powerful and with a greed for gold.

Name: Father Dagon
Description: A scale-skinned humanoid fish§ the ruler of deep ones.

Name: Filthy street urchin
Description: He looks squalid and thoroughly revolting.

Name: Fire elemental
Description: It is a towering inferno of flames.

Name: Fire giant
Description: A glowing fourteen foot tall giant. Flames drip from its red skin.

Name: Fire hound
Description: Flames lick at its feet and its tongue is a blade of fire. You can feel a furnace heat radiating from the creature.

Name: Fire Phantom
Description: He's back from the grave for vengeance on those whoburnt him. He has no mercy for those in his way.

Name: Fire spirit
Description: A whirlwind of sentient flame.

Name: Fire vampire
Description: A burning point of light§ floating through the air and flickering with sinister purpose.

Name: Fire vortex
Description: A whirling maelstrom of fire.

Name: Flesh golem
Description: A shambling humanoid monster with long scars.

Name: Floating eye
Description: A disembodied eye§ floating a few feet above the ground.

Name: Flying polyp
Description: 'A horrible elder race of half polypous§ utterly alien entities... Suggestions of monstrous plasticity and... lapses of visibility.' H.P.Lovecraft - 'The Shadow Out of Time'

Name: Flying skull
Description: A skullpack animated by necromantic spells.

Name: Foolhardy adolescent
Description: He wants to kill a hero to prove that he's hard.

Name: Forest troll
Description: He is green skinned and ugly.

Name: Formless spawn of Tsathoggua
Description: A black§ protean being of amorphous slime.

Name: Frost giant
Description: A twelve foot tall giant covered in furs.

Name: Fruit bat
Description: A fast-moving pest.

Name: Frumious bandersnatch
Description: It is a vast armoured centipede with massive mandibles and a spiked tail.

Name: Fthagghua§ Lord of the fire vampires
Description: A fiery serpentine entity§ streaking through the air like a comet. The heat emanating from this creature is almost unbearable.
FriendlyName: Fthagghua§ Lord of the fire vampires

Name: Gaping Maw
Description: A hole in the fabric of reality§ leading to who knows what plane...

Name: Gelatinous cube
Description: It is a strange§ vast gelatinous structure that assumes cubic proportions as it lines all four walls of the corridors it patrols. Through its transparent jelly structure you can see treasures it has engulfed§ and a few corpses as well.

Name: Ghost
Description: You don't believe in them.

Name: Ghoul
Description: Flesh is falling off in chunks from this decaying abomination.

Name: Giant army ant
Description: An armoured form moving with purpose. Powerful on its own§ flee when hordes of them march.

Name: Giant black ant
Description: It is about three feet long.

Name: Giant black dragon fly
Description: The size of a large bird§ this fly drips caustic acid.

Name: Giant black rat
Description: It is a rodent of unusual size.

Name: Giant bronze dragon fly
Description: This vast gleaming bronze fly has wings which beat mesmerically fast.

Name: Giant brown bat
Description: It screeches as it attacks.

Name: Giant brown rat
Description: It is a very vicious rodent.

Name: Giant clear centipede
Description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

Name: Giant cockroach
Description: Oh no! They are everywhere!

Name: Giant flea
Description: It makes you itch just to look at it.

Name: Giant fruit fly
Description: A fast-breeding§ annoying pest.

Name: Giant gold dragon fly
Description: Large beating wings support this dazzling insect. A loud buzzing noise pervades the air.

Name: Giant green dragon fly
Description: A vast§ foul-smelling dragonfly.

Name: Giant grey ant
Description: It is an ant encased in shaggy grey fur.

Name: Giant grey scorpion
Description: It is a giant grey scorpion. It looks poisonous.

Name: Giant red ant
Description: It is large and has venomous mandibles.

Name: Giant red scorpion
Description: It is fast and poisonous.

Name: Giant salamander
Description: A large black and yellow lizard. You'd better run away!

Name: Giant skeleton troll
Description: It is the animated form of a massive troll.

Name: Giant slime mold
Description: A pile of rotting vegetation that slides towards you with a disgusting stench§ waking all it nears.

Name: Giant spider
Description: It is a vast black spider whose bulbous body is bloated with poison.

Name: Giant tarantula
Description: A giant spider with hairy black and red legs.

Name: Giant white ant
Description: It is about two feet long and has sharp pincers.

Name: Giant white centipede
Description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

Name: Giant white dragon fly
Description: It is a large fly that drips frost.

Name: Giant white louse
Description: It is six inches long.

Name: Giant white mouse
Description: It is about three feet long with large teeth.

Name: Giant yellow scorpion
Description: It is a giant scorpion with a sharp stinger.

Name: Gibbering mouther
Description: A chaotic mass of pulsating flesh§ mouths and eyes.

Name: Glaaki
Description: Oval bodied with countless thin spines§ and three baleful yellow eyes on thin stalks.

Name: Glaryssa§ Succubus Queen
Description: Drop dead gorgeous - literally.

Name: Glaurung§ Father of the Dragons
Description: Glaurung is the father of all dragons§ and was for a long time the most powerful. Nevertheless§ he still has full command over his brood and can command them to appear whenever he so wishes. He is the definition of dragonfire.

Name: Gnome mage
Description: A mage of short stature.

Name: Goat of Mendes
Description: It is a demonic creature from the lowest hell§ vaguely resembling a large black he-goat.

Name: Golfimbul§ the Hill Orc Chief
Description: A leader of a band of raiding orcs§ he picks on hobbits.

Name: Gorbag§ the Orc Captain
Description: A gruesomely ugly but cunning orc§ his eyes regard you with hatred. His powerful arms flex menacingly as he advances.

Name: Gorgimera
Description: It has 3 heads - gorgon§ goat and dragon - all attached to a lion's body.

Name: Gothmog§ the High Captain of Balrogs
Description: Gothmog is the Chief Balrog in Morgoth's personal guard. He is renowned for slaying Ecthelion the Warder of the Gates and he has never been defeated in combat. With his whip of flame and awesome fiery breath he saved his master from Ungoliant's rage.
FriendlyName: Gothmog§ the High Captain of Balrogs

Name: Grand master thief
Description: A furtive figure who makes you want to hide all your valuables.

Name: Grape jelly
Description: It is a pulsing mound of glowing flesh.

Name: Gravity hound
Description: Unfettered by the usual constraints of gravity§ these unnatural creatures are walking on the walls and even the ceiling! The earth suddenly feels rather less solid as you see gravity warp all round the monsters.

Name: Great crystal drake
Description: A huge crystalline dragon. Its claws could cut you to shreds and its teeth are razor sharp. Strange colours ripple through it as it moves in the light.

Name: Great Cthulhu
Description: This creature is death incarnate. 'A monster of vaguely anthropoid outline§ but with an octopus-like head... and long narrow wings behind... A mountain walked or stumbled.'

Name: Great hell wyrm
Description: A vast dragon of immense power. Fire leaps continuously from its huge form. The air around it scalds you. Its slightest glance burns you§ and you truly realize how insignificant you are.

Name: Great ice wyrm
Description: An immense dragon capable of awesome destruction. You have never felt such extreme cold§ or witnessed such an icy stare. Begone quickly or feel its wrath!

Name: Great storm wyrm
Description: A vast dragon of power. Storms and lightning crash around its titanic form. Deep blue scales reflect the flashes and highlight the creature's great muscles. It regards you with contempt.

Name: Great Wyrm of Balance
Description: A massive dragon§ it is thousands of years old and seeks to maintain the Cosmic Balance. It sees you as an upstart troublemaker without the wisdom to control your actions.

Name: Great Wyrm of Chaos
Description: A massive dragon of changing form. As you watch§ it appears first fair and then foul. Its body is twisted by chaotic forces as it strives to stay real. Its very existence distorts the universe around it.

Name: Great Wyrm of Law
Description: A massive dragon of powerful intellect. It seeks to dominate the universe and despises all other life. It sees all who do not obey it as mere insects to be crushed underfoot.

Name: Great Wyrm of Many Colours
Description: A huge dragon whose scales shimmer in myriad hues.

Name: Great Wyrm of Power
Description: The mightiest of all dragonkind§ a great wyrm of power is seldom encountered in our world. It can crush stars with its might.

Name: Greater draconic quylthulg
Description: A massive mound of scaled flesh§ throbbing and pulsating with multi-hued light.

Name: Greater rotting quylthulg
Description: A massive pile of rotting flesh. A disgusting stench fills the air as it throbs and writhes.

Name: Greater titan
Description: A forty foot tall humanoid that shakes the ground as it walks. The power radiating from its frame shakes your courage§ its hatred inspired by your defiance.

Name: Greater wall monster
Description: A sentient§ moving section of wall.

Name: Green glutton ghost
Description: It is a very ugly green ghost with a voracious appetite.

Name: Green icky thing
Description: It is a smallish§ slimy§ icky§ acidic creature.

Name: Green jelly
Description: It is a large pile of pulsing green flesh.

Name: Green mold
Description: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor.

Name: Green naga
Description: A large green serpent with a female's torso. Her green skin glistens with acid.

Name: Green ooze
Description: It's green and it's oozing.

Name: Green worm mass
Description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

Name: Gremlin
Description: Don't feed them after midnight!

Name: Grendel
Description: An ogre renowned for acts of surpassing cruelty.

Name: Grendel's mother
Description: She taught her son everything he knows.

Name: Grey icky thing
Description: It is a smallish§ slimy§ icky§ nasty creature.

Name: Grey mold
Description: A small strange growth.

Name: Grey wraith
Description: A tangible but ghostly form§ made of grey fog. The air around it feels deathly cold.

Name: Grid bug
Description: A strange electric bug.

Name: Griffon
Description: It is half lion§ half eagle. It flies menacingly towards you.

Name: Grip§ Farmer Maggot's dog
Description: A rather vicious dog belonging to Farmer Maggot. It thinks you are stealing mushrooms.

Name: Grishnakh§ the Hill Orc
Description: He is a cunning and devious orc with a chaotic nature.

Name: Grom§ Master of Earth
Description: A towering stone elemental stands before you. The walls and ceiling are reduced to rubble as Grom advances.

Name: Groo the Wanderer
Description: He who laughs at Groo's brains will find there is nothing to laugh about... erm§ nobody laughs at Groo and lives.

Name: Guardian naga
Description: A giant snake-like figure with a woman's torso.

Name: Hagen§ son of Alberich
Description: Alberich's son§ born of a mortal woman won with gold.

Name: Hairy mold
Description: It is a strange hairy growth on the dungeon floor.

Name: Halfling slinger
Description: A rebel halfling who has rejected the halfling tradition of archery.

Name: Hand druj
Description: A skeletal hand floating in the air§ motionless except for its flexing fingers.

Name: Hardened warrior
Description: A scarred warrior who moves with confidence.

Name: Hastur the Unspeakable
Description: Its form is partially that of a reptile§ partially that of a gigantic octopus. It will destroy you.

Name: Headless
Description: Headless humanoid abominations created by a magical mutation.

Name: Hellbat
Description: Devil-bats§ notoriously difficult to kill.

Name: Hellblade
Description: A deadly blade of chaos§ moving of its own volition.

Name: Hellcat
Description: It is as large as a tiger§ its yellow eyes are pupilless.

Name: Hill giant
Description: A ten foot tall humanoid with powerful muscles.

Name: Hill orc
Description: He is a hardy well-weathered survivor.

Name: Hippogriff
Description: A strange hybrid of eagle§ lion and horse. It looks weird.

Name: Hobbes the Tiger
Description: Fast-moving§ with a taste for tuna sandwiches.

Name: Hobo
Description: Ugly doesn't begin to describe him.

Name: Homonculous
Description: It is a small demonic spirit full of malevolence.

Name: Hound of Tindalos
Description: 'They are lean and athirst!'

Name: Hunting hawk
Description: Trained to hunt and kill without fear.

Name: Hunting horror
Description: It is a winged serpent with a distorted head.

Name: Hypnos
Description: Beautiful and youthful§ this Outer God appears almost human. But appearances can be deceptive.

Name: Ice elemental
Description: It is a towering glacier of ice.

Name: Ice troll
Description: He is a white troll with powerfully clawed hands.

Name: Illusionist
Description: A deceptive spell caster.

Name: Imp
Description: The lawful evil master's favourite pet.

Name: Impact hound
Description: A deep brown shape is visible before you§ its canine form strikes you with an almost physical force. The dungeon floor buckles as if struck by a powerful Attack as it stalks towards you.

Name: Inertia hound
Description: Bizarrely§ this hound seems to be hardly moving at all§ yet it approaches you with deadly menace. It makes you tired just to look at it.

Name: Ipsissimus
Description: A gaunt figure§ clothed in black robes.

Name: Iron golem
Description: It is a massive metal statue that moves steadily towards you.

Name: Iron lich
Description: It is a huge§ twisted grey skull floating through the air. Its cold eyes burn with hatred towards all who live.

Name: It
Description: Nobody has ever seen It.

Name: Ithaqua the Windwalker
Description: The Wendigo§ moving so fast that you can see little except two glowing eyes burning with hatred.

Name: Jabberwock
Description: 'Beware the Jabberwock§ my son!The jaws that bite§ the claws that catch!'

Name: Jackal
Description: It is a yapping snarling dog§ dangerous when in a pack.

Name: Jubjub bird
Description: A vast legendary bird§ its iron talons rake the most impenetrable of surfaces and its screech echoes through the many winding dungeon corridors.

Name: Karakal§ Spirit of Fire
Description: A towering fire elemental§ Karakal burns everything beyond recognition.

Name: Kaschei the Immortal
Description: A stench of corruption and decay surrounds this sorcerer§ who has clearly risen from the grave to continue his foul plots and schemes.

Name: Kavlax the Many-Headed
Description: A large dragon with a selection of heads§ all shouting and arguing as they look for prey§ but each with its own deadly breath weapon.

Name: Khamul the Easterling
Description: A warrior-king of the East. Khamul is a powerful opponent§ his skill in combat awesome and his form twisted by evil cunning.

Name: Khufu the mummified King
Description: He is out to have a revenge on you who have desecrated his tomb.

Name: Killer bee
Description: It is poisonous and aggressive.

Name: Killer brown beetle
Description: It is a vicious insect with a tough carapace.

Name: Killer crimson beetle
Description: A giant beetle with poisonous mandibles.

Name: Killer iridescent beetle
Description: It is a giant beetle§ whose carapace shimmers with vibrant energies.

Name: Killer red beetle
Description: It is a giant beetle wreathed in flames.

Name: Killer slicer beetle
Description: It is a beetle with deadly sharp cutting mandibles and a rock-hard carapace.

Name: Killer stag beetle
Description: It is a giant beetle with vicious claws.

Name: King cobra
Description: It is a large snake with a hooded face.

Name: King Rat
Description: A large brown rat. He's the leader of the pack.

Name: Klingsor§ Evil Master of Magic
Description: Klingsor§ whose hopeless effort to join the Knights of the Grail was thwarted§ turned to black magic and became a deadly necromancer.

Name: Kobold
Description: It is a small§ dog-headed humanoid.

Name: Kouko
Description: It is a ghostly apparition with a humanoid form.

Name: Lagduf§ the Snaga
Description: A captain of a regiment of weaker orcs§ Lagduf keeps his troop in order with displays of excessive violence.

Name: Large brown snake
Description: It is about eight feet long.

Name: Large grey snake
Description: It is about ten feet long.

Name: Large kobold
Description: It a man-sized figure with the all too recognizable face of a kobold.

Name: Large yellow snake
Description: It is about ten feet long.

Name: Lasha§ Mistress of Water
Description: With the body of a beautiful mermaid§ she hides her cruelnature well§ until it is too late.

Name: Law drake
Description: This dragon is clever and cunning. It laughs at your puny efforts to disturb it.

Name: Law ghost
Description: An almost life-like creature which is nothing more than a phantom created by the law.

Name: Lemure
Description: It is the larval form of a major demon.

Name: Leng spider
Description: 'There were scenes of old wars§ wherein Leng's almost-humans fought with the bloated purple spiders of neighbouring vales.' H.P.Lovecraft - 'The Dream Quest of Unknown Kadath'

Name: Lesser titan
Description: It is a humanoid figure thirty feet tall that gives off an aura of power and hate.

Name: Lesser wall monster
Description: A sentient§ moving section of wall.

Name: Lich
Description: It is a skeletal form dressed in robes. It radiates vastly evil power.

Name: Light hound
Description: A brilliant canine form whose light hurts your eyes§ even at this distance.

Name: Livingstone
Description: A sentient section of wall.

Name: Lord of Chaos
Description: He is one of the few true masters of the art§ being extremely skillful in all forms of unarmed combat and controlling the chaos with disdainful ease.

Name: Lost soul
Description: It is almost insubstantial.

Name: Mage
Description: A fat mage with glasses.

Name: Magic mushroom patch
Description: Yum! It looks quite tasty. It seems to glow with an unusual light.

Name: Magma elemental
Description: It is a towering glowing form of molten hate.

Name: Malicious leprechaun
Description: This little creature has a fiendish gleam in its eyes.

Name: Mandor§ Master of Chaos
Description: Mandor is one of the greatest chaos Masters§ a formidable magician.

Name: Manes
Description: It is a minor but aggressive demon.

Name: Mangy looking leper
Description: You feel it isn't safe to touch him.

Name: Manticore
Description: It is a winged lion's body with a human torso and a tail covered in vicious spikes.

Name: Master lich
Description: A skeletal form wrapped in robes. Powerful magic crackles along its bony fingers.

Name: Master quylthulg
Description: A pulsating mound of flesh§ shining with silver pulses of throbbing light.

Name: Master rogue
Description: A thief of great power and shifty speed.

Name: Master thief
Description: Cool and confident§ fast and lithe; protect your possessions quickly!

Name: Master vampire
Description: It is a humanoid form dressed in robes. Power emanates from its chilling frame.

Name: Master yeek
Description: A small humanoid that radiates some power.

Name: Mastiff
Description: Well-trained watchdogs§ obedient to death.

Name: Mature black dragon
Description: A large dragon§ with scales of deepest black.

Name: Mature blue dragon
Description: A large dragon§ scales tinted deep blue.

Name: Mature bronze dragon
Description: A large dragon with scales of rich bronze.

Name: Mature gold dragon
Description: A large dragon with scales of gleaming gold.

Name: Mature green dragon
Description: A large dragon§ scales tinted deep green.

Name: Mature multi-hued dragon
Description: A large dragon§ scales shimmering many colours.

Name: Mature red dragon
Description: A large dragon§ scales tinted deep red.

Name: Mature white dragon
Description: A large dragon§ scales gleaming bright white.

Name: Maulotaur
Description: It is a belligrent minotaur with some destructive magical arsenal§ armed with a hammer.

Name: Mean looking mercenary
Description: No job is too low for him.

Name: Medusa§ the Gorgon
Description: Her face could sink a thousand ships.

Name: Memory moss
Description: A mass of green vegetation. You don't remember seeing anything like it before.

Name: Mephistopheles§ Lord of Hell
Description: A duke of hell§ in the flesh.

Name: Metallic blue centipede
Description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

Name: Metallic green centipede
Description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

Name: Metallic red centipede
Description: It is about four feet long and carnivorous.

Name: Mi-Go
Description: Five feet long pinkish insectoids with a multitude of antennae§ with a buzzing voice.

Name: Mime§ the Nibelung
Description: This tiny night dwarf is as greedy for gold as his brother§ Alberich.

Name: Mind flayer
Description: A humanoid form with a gruesome head§ tentacular mouth§ and piercing eyes. Claws reach out for you and you feel a presence invade your mind.

Name: Minotaur
Description: It is a cross between a human and a bull.

Name: Mirkwood spider
Description: A strong and powerful spider from Mirkwood forest. Cunning and evil§ it seeks to taste your juicy insides.

Name: Mithril golem
Description: It is a massive statue of purest mithril. It looks expensive!

Name: Moaning spirit
Description: A ghostly apparition that shrieks horribly.

Name: Moon beast
Description: A great greyish-white slippery toad-creature with a mass of pink tentacles on the end of its snout.

Name: Multi-hued hound
Description: Shimmering in rainbow hues§ this hound is beautiful and deadly.

Name: Mummified human
Description: It is a human form encased in mouldy wrappings.

Name: Mummified orc
Description: It is an orcish figure covered in wrappings.

Name: Nazgul
Description: A tall black cloaked Ringwraith§ radiating an aura of fear.

Name: Nether hound
Description: You feel a soul-tearing chill upon viewing this beast§ a ghostly form of darkness in the shape of a large dog.

Name: Nether worm mass
Description: It is a disgusting mass of dark worms§ eating each other§ the floor§ the air§ you....

Name: Nether wraith
Description: A form that hurts the eye§ death permeates the air around it. As it nears you§ a coldness saps your soul.

Name: Newt
Description: A small§ harmless lizard.

Name: Nexus hound
Description: A locus of conflicting points coalesce to form the vague shape of a huge hound. Or is it just your imagination?

Name: Nexus quylthulg
Description: It is a very unstable§ strange pulsing mound of flesh.

Name: Nexus vortex
Description: A maelstrom of potent magical energy.

Name: Nibelung
Description: Night dwarfs collecting new riches for their collection.

Name: Night lizard
Description: It is a black lizard with overlapping scales and a powerful jaw.

Name: Night mare
Description: A fearsome skeletal horse with glowing eyes§ that watch you with little more than a hatred of all that lives.

Name: Night stalker
Description: It is impossible to define its form but its violence is legendary.

Name: Nightblade
Description: A dark elf so stealthy that he is almost impossible to see.

Name: Nightcrawler
Description: This intensely evil creature bears the form of a gargantuan black worm. Its gaping maw is a void of blackness§ acid drips from its steely hide. It is like nothing you have ever seen before§ and a terrible chill runs down your spine as you face it.

Name: Nightgaunt
Description: It is a black§ horned humanoid with wings.

Name: Nightwalker
Description: A huge giant garbed in black§ more massive than a titan and stronger than a dragon. With terrible blows§ it breaks your armour from your back§ leaving you defenseless against its evil wrath. It can smell your fear§ and you in turn smell the awful stench of death as this ghastly figure strides towards you menacingly.

Name: Nightwing
Description: Everywhere colours seem paler and the air chiller. At the centre of the cold stands a mighty figure. Its wings envelop you in the chill of death as the nightwing reaches out to draw you into oblivion. Your muscles sag and your mind loses all will to fight as you stand in awe of this mighty being.

Name: Ninja
Description: A humanoid clothed in black who moves with blinding speed.

Name: Nobody§ the Undefined Ghost
Description: It seems strangely familiar...

Name: Novice archer
Description: A nasty little fellow with a bow and arrow.

Name: Novice cultist
Description: He is tripping over his fetishes.

Name: Novice fanatic
Description: He thinks you are an agent of the devil.

Name: Novice mage
Description: He is leaving behind a trail of dropped spell components.

Name: Novice ranger
Description: An agile hunter§ ready and relaxed.

Name: Novice rogue
Description: A rather shifty individual.

Name: Novice warrior
Description: He looks inexperienced but tough.

Name: Nyarlathotep
Description: The Crawling Chaos in it's most monstrous form. It will do all in its power to keep you away from its master§ Azathoth.

Name: Nyogtha§ the Thing that Should not Be
Description: A nightmarish fetid§ black irididescence oozing towards you.
FriendlyName: Nyogtha§ the Thing that Should not Be

Name: Ochre jelly
Description: A fast moving highly acidic jelly thing§ that is eating away the floor it rests on.

Name: Ogre
Description: A hideous§ smallish giant that is often found near or with orcs.

Name: Ogre mage
Description: A hideous ogre wrapped in black sorcerous robes.

Name: Ogre shaman
Description: It is an ogre wrapped in furs and covered in grotesque body paints.

Name: Olog
Description: It is a massive intelligent troll with needle sharp fangs.

Name: Omarax the Eye Tyrant
Description: A disembodied eye§ floating in the air. His gaze seems to shred your soul and his spells crush your will. He is ancient§ his history steeped in forgotten evils§ his atrocities numerous and sickening.

Name: Ooze elemental
Description: It is a towering mass of filth§ an eyesore of ooze.

Name: Orc captain
Description: An armoured orc with an air of authority.

Name: Orc shaman
Description: An orc dressed in skins who gestures wildly.

Name: Orfax§ Son of Boldor
Description: He's just like daddy! He knows mighty spells§ but fortunately he is a yeek.

Name: Oriental vampire
Description: The oriental vampire is a mist-like creature.

Name: Panther
Description: A large black cat§ stalking you with intent. It thinks you're its next meal.

Name: Phantom beast
Description: A creature that is half real§ half illusion.

Name: Phantom warrior
Description: Creatures that are half real§ half illusion.

Name: Phase spider
Description: A spider that never seems quite there. Everywhere you look it is just half-seen in the corner of one eye.

Name: Pitiful looking beggar
Description: You just can't help feeling sorry for him.

Name: Plasma hound
Description: The very air warps as pure elemental energy stalks towards you in the shape of a giant hound. Your hair stands on end and your palms itch as you sense trouble.

Name: Plasma vortex
Description: A whirlpool of intense flame§ charring the stones at your feet.

Name: Player
Description: You

Name: Poltergeist
Description: It is a ghastly§ ghostly form.

Name: Potion mimic
Description: A strange creature that disguises itself as discarded objects to lure unsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

Name: Pseudo dragon
Description: A small relative of the dragon that inhabits dark caves.

Name: Pukelman
Description: A stumpy figure carved from stone§ with glittering eyes.

Name: Purple mushroom patch
Description: Yum! It looks quite tasty.

Name: Qlzqqlzuup§ the Lord of Flesh
Description: This disgusting creature squeals and snorts as it writhes on the floor. It pulsates with evil. Its intent is to overwhelm you with monster after monster§ until it can greedily dine on your remains.

Name: Quasit
Description: The chaotic evil master's favourite pet.

Name: Quiver slot
Description: An arrow hole in the floor§ covered in fungal tendrils.

Name: Quylthulg
Description: It is a strange pulsing mound of flesh.

Name: Radiation eye
Description: A disembodied eye§ crackling with energy.

Name: Rattlesnake
Description: It is recognized by the hard-scaled end of its body that is often rattled to frighten its prey.

Name: Raving lunatic
Description: Drooling and comical§ but then§ what do you expect?

Name: Red dragon bat
Description: It is a sharp-tailed bat§ wreathed in fire.

Name: Red jelly
Description: It is a large pulsating mound of red flesh.

Name: Red mold
Description: It is a strange red growth on the dungeon floor; it seems to burn with flame.

Name: Red naga
Description: A large red snake with a woman's torso.

Name: Red worm mass
Description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

Name: Redweed
Description: A strange fibrous growth springing up everywhere.

Name: Ring mimic
Description: A strange creature that disguises itself as discarded objects to lure unsuspecting adventurers within reach of its venomous claws.

Name: Robin Hood§ the Outlaw
Description: The legendary archer steals from the rich (you qualify).

Name: Rock lizard
Description: It is a small lizard with a hardened hide.

Name: Rotting corpse
Description: Corpses awakened from their sleep by dark sorceries.

Name: Rotting quylthulg
Description: It is a pulsing flesh mound that reeks of death and putrefaction.

Name: Sabre-tooth tiger
Description: A fierce and dangerous cat§ its huge tusks and sharp claws would lacerate even the strongest armour.

Name: Salamander
Description: A small black and orange lizard.

Name: Sangahyando of Umbar
Description: A Black Numenorean with a blacker heart.

Name: Saruman of Many Colours
Description: Originally known as the White§ Saruman fell prey to Sauron's wiles. He searches forever for the One Ring§ to become a mighty Sorcerer-King of the world.

Name: Sasquatch
Description: A tall shaggy§ furry humanoid§ it could call the yeti brother.

Name: Sauron§ the Sorcerer
Description: Mighty in spells and enchantments§he created the One Ring. His eyes glow with power and his gaze seeks to destroy your soul. He has many servants§ and rarely fights without them.

Name: Scatha the Worm
Description: An ancient and wise Dragon. Scatha has grown clever over the long years. His scales are covered with frost§ and his breath sends a shower of ice into the air.

Name: Scrawny cat
Description: A skinny little furball with sharp claws and a menacing look.

Name: Scruffy little dog
Description: A thin flea-ridden mutt§ growling as you get close.

Name: Scruffy looking hobbit
Description: A short little guy§ in bedraggled clothes. He appears to be looking for a good tavern.

Name: Servitor of the outer gods
Description: 'Toad - like creatures which seemed constantly to be changing shape and appearance§ and from whom emanated§ by some means I could not distinguish§ a ghostly ululation§ a piping.' August Derleth - 'The Lurker at The Threshold'.

Name: Shadow creature
Description: A humanoid creature with extra joints in its extremities.

Name: Shadow demon
Description: A mighty spirit of darkness of vaguely humanoid form. Razor-edged claws reach out to end your life as it glides towards you§ seeking to suck the energy from your soul to feed its power.

Name: Shadow drake
Description: It is a dragon-like form wrapped in shadow. Glowing red eyes shine out in the dark.

Name: Shadow hound
Description: A hole in the air in the shape of a huge hound. No light falls upon its form.

Name: Shadowlord
Description: An aura of hatred§ cowardice and falsehood surrounds you as this cloaked figure floats towards you.

Name: Shagrat§ the Orc Captain
Description: He is an Uruk of power and great cunning.

Name: Shaman
Description: A man with powerful spirit friends...

Name: Shambler
Description: This elemental creature is power incarnate; it looks like a huge polar bear with a huge gaping maw instead of a head.

Name: Shantak
Description: A scaly bird larger than an elephant§ with a horse-like head.

Name: Shelob§ Spider of Darkness
Description: Shelob is an enormous bloated spider§ rumoured to have been one of the brood of Ungoliant the Unlight. Her poison is legendary§ as is her ego§ which may be her downfall. She used to guard the pass through Cirith Ungol§ but has not been seen there for many eons.

Name: Shimmering vortex
Description: A strange pillar of shining light that hurts your eyes. Its shape changes constantly as it cuts through the air towards you. It is like a beacon§ waking monsters from their slumber.

Name: Shoggoth
Description: A nightmarish fetid§ black irididescence oozing towards you.

Name: Shrieker mushroom patch
Description: Yum! These look quite tasty.

Name: Shub-Niggurath§ Black Goat of the Woods
Description: This horrendous outer god looks like a writhing cloudy mass filled with mouths and tentacles.
FriendlyName: Shub-Niggurath§ Black Goat of the Woods

Name: Shudde M'ell
Description: The largest of the cthonians and leader of his kind.

Name: Silent watcher
Description: A figure carved from stone§ with three vulture faces. Their eyes glow a malevolent light...

Name: Silver jelly
Description: It is a large pile of silver flesh that sucks all light from its surroundings.

Name: Singing§ happy drunk
Description: He makes you glad to be sober.

Name: Skeleton human
Description: It is an animated human skeleton.

Name: Skull druj
Description: A glowing skull possessed by sorcerous power. It need not move§ but merely blast you with mighty magic.

Name: Sky Drake
Description: The mightiest elemental dragon of air§ it can destroy you with ease.

Name: Slime mold
Description: It is a smallish§ slimy§ icky§ hungry creature.

Name: Small child
Description: A rather cute child with large trusting eyes.

Name: Small kobold
Description: It is a squat and ugly humanoid figure.

Name: Smaug the Golden
Description: Smaug is one of the Uruloki that still survive§ a fire-drake of immense cunning and intelligence. His speed through air is matched by few other dragons and his dragonfire is what legends are made of.

Name: Smeagol
Description: He's been sneaking§ and he wants his 'precious.'

Name: Snaga
Description: He is one of the many weaker 'slave' orcs§ often mistakenly known as a goblin.

Name: Snake of Yig
Description: It is a giant snake that drips with poison.

Name: Soldier ant
Description: A large ant with powerful mandibles.

Name: Sorcerer
Description: A human figure in robes§ he moves with magically improved speed§ and his hands are ablur with spell casting.

Name: Spectator
Description: It has three small eyestalks and a large central eye.

Name: Spectral tyrannosaur
Description: A deadly undead horror which looks like a skeletal tyrannosaur surrounded by a sickly green glow.

Name: Spectre
Description: A phantasmal shrieking spirit. Its wail drives the intense cold of pure evil deep within your body.

Name: Spirit naga
Description: A wraithly snake-like form with the torso of a beautiful woman§ it is the most powerful of its kind.

Name: Spotted jelly
Description: A jelly thing.

Name: Spotted mushroom patch
Description: Yum! It looks quite tasty.

Name: Stairway to hell
Description: Often found in graveyards.

Name: Star-spawn of Cthulhu
Description: The last remnants of sanity threaten to leave your brain as you behold this titanic bat-winged§ octopus-headed unholy abomination.

Name: Stone giant
Description: It is eighteen feet tall and looking at you.

Name: Stone golem
Description: It is a massive animated statue.

Name: Stone troll
Description: He is a giant troll with scabrous black skin.

Name: Storm giant
Description: It is a twenty-five foot tall giant wreathed in lighting.

Name: Straasha§ Queen of Air
Description: A towering air elemental§ Straasha§ the sorceress§ avoids your blows with her extreme speed.

Name: Tengu
Description: It is a fast-moving demon that blinks quickly in and out of existence; no other demon matches its teleporting mastery.

Name: The Collector
Description: A strange little gnome§ he's been collecting toys and friends and doesn't want to give them up.

Name: The disembodied hand
Description: Even today§ nobody knows where it lurks...

Name: The Emissary
Description: The Emmisary can pass for human and is used by her demonic overlords to infiltrate human society and gather information. Only her eyes give away her demonic nature.

Name: The Emperor Quylthulg
Description: A huge seething mass of flesh with a rudimentary intelligence§ the Emperor Quylthulg changes colours in front of your eyes. Pulsating first one colour then the next§ it knows only it must bring help to protect itself.

Name: The Icky Queen
Description: And you thought her offspring were icky!

Name: The Insane Crusader
Description: Once a powerful adventurer§ this poor fighter has seen a few too many eldritch horrors in his time. Any shred of lucidity is long gone§ but he still remains dangerous. He wanders aimlessly through the dungeon randomly stiking at foes both real and imagined§ all the while screaming out at the world which caused his condition.

Name: The King in Yellow
Description: A sentient arcane tome casting spells with malevolent intent.

Name: The Lernean Hydra
Description: A massive legendary hydra. It has twelve powerful heads. Its many eyes stare at you as clouds of smoke and poisonous vapour rise from its seething form.

Name: The Norsa
Description: An elephantine horror with five trunks§ each capable of breathing destructive blasts of elements.

Name: The Phoenix
Description: A massive glowing eagle bathed in flames. The searing heat chars your skin and melts your armour.

Name: The Queen Ant
Description: She's upset because you hurt her children.

Name: The Stormbringer
Description: The mightiest of hellblades§ a black runesword which thirsts for your soul.

Name: The Ultimate Dungeon Cleaner
Description: It looks like a huge spiked roller. It was designed to keep this dungeon clean§ and you are the biggest spot of dirt in sight.

Name: The Witch-King of Angmar
Description: The Chief of the Ringwraiths. A fell being of devastating power. His spells are lethal and his combat blows crushingly hard. He moves at speed§ and commands legions of evil to do his bidding. It is said that he is fated never to die by the hand of mortal man.

Name: Thuringwethil
Description: Chief messenger between Sauron and Morgoth§ she is surely the most deadly of her vampire race. At first she is charming to meet§ but her wings and eyes give away her true form.

Name: Tiger
Description: One of the largest of its species§ a sleek orange and black shape creeps towards you§ ready to pounce.

Name: Time elemental
Description: You have not seen it yet.

Name: Time hound
Description: You get a terrible sense of deja vu§ or is it a premonition? All at once you see a little puppy and a toothless old dog. Perhaps you should give up and go to bed.

Name: Time vortex
Description: You haven't seen it yet.

Name: Trapper
Description: This creature traps unsuspecting victims and paralyzes them§ to be slowly digested later.

Name: Troll thaumaturgist
Description: A troll who is so bright he knows how to read.

Name: Tsathoggua
Description: Toad shaped and sleepy§ don't let his inoffensive appearance fool you. He still bears all the power of a Great Old One.

Name: Tselakus§ the Dreadlord
Description: This huge affront to existence twists and tears at the fabric of space.Darkness itself recoils from the touch of Tselakus as he leaves a trailof death and destruction. Mighty claws rend reality as heannihilates all in his path to your soul!

Name: Tulzscha
Description: 'A belching column of sick greenish flame... spouting volcanically from depths profound and inconceivable§ casting no shadows as a healthy flame should§ and coating the nitrous stone with a nasty venomous verdigris.' H.P.Lovecraft - 'The Festival'.

Name: Tyrannosaur
Description: A horror from prehistory§ reawakened by chaos.

Name: Ugluk§ the Uruk
Description: Another of Morgoth's servants§ this orc is strong and cunning. He is ugly and scarred from many power struggles.

Name: Ultra-elite fanatic
Description: Fighting for a good cause§ and they consider you an agent of evil.

Name: Umber hulk
Description: This bizarre creature has glaring eyes and large mandibles capable of slicing through rock.

Name: Undead beholder
Description: A disembodied eye§ floating in the air. Black nether storms rage around its bloodshot pupil and light seems to bend as it sucks its power from the very air around it. Your soul chills as it drains your vitality for its evil enchantments.

Name: Undead mass
Description: A sickening mound of decaying flesh§ bones§ hands and so on. It seems to be growing.

Name: Unmaker
Description: Summoned from the planes of Chaos§ it is a mass of semi-sentient chaos§ spreading uncontrollably and destroying everything in its path.

Name: Uruk
Description: He is a cunning orc of power§ as tall as a man§ and stronger. He fears little.

Name: Vampire
Description: It is a humanoid with an aura of power. You notice a sharp set of front teeth.

Name: Vampire bat
Description: An undead bat that flies at your neck hungrily.

Name: Vampire lord
Description: A foul wind chills your bones as this ghastly figure approaches.

Name: Vecna§ the Emperor Lich
Description: He is a highly cunning§ extremely magical being§ spoken of in legends. This ancient shadow of death wilts any living thing it passes.

Name: Vermicious Knid
Description: An amorphous shape that looks like wet grey clay with two pale eyes. It is totally silent as it oozes towards you.

Name: Vibration hound
Description: A blurry canine form which seems to be moving as fast as the eye can follow. You can feel the earth resonating beneath your feet.

Name: Vort the Kobold Queen
Description: Strong and powerful§ for a kobold.

Name: War bear
Description: Bears with tusks§ trained to kill.

Name: War troll
Description: A massive troll§ equipped with a scimitar and heavy armour.

Name: Warg
Description: It is a large wolf with eyes full of cunning.

Name: Water elemental
Description: It is a towering tempest of water.

Name: Water hound
Description: Liquid footprints follow this hound as it pads around the dungeon. An acrid smell of acid rises from the dog's pelt.

Name: Water spirit
Description: A whirlpool of sentient liquid.

Name: Water troll
Description: He is a troll that reeks of brine.

Name: Water vortex
Description: A caustic spinning whirlpool of water.

Name: Wereworm
Description: A huge wormlike shape dripping acid§ twisted by evil sorcery into a foul monster that breeds on death.

Name: White harpy
Description: A flying§ screeching bird with a woman's face.

Name: White icky thing
Description: It is a smallish§ slimy§ icky creature.

Name: White jelly
Description: Its a large pile of white flesh.

Name: White wolf
Description: A large and muscled wolf from the northern wastes. Its breath is cold and icy and its fur coated in frost.

Name: White worm mass
Description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

Name: White wraith
Description: It is a tangible but ghostly form made of white fog.

Name: Wild cat
Description: A larger than normal feline§ hissing loudly. Its velvet claws conceal a fistful of needles.

Name: Wild man
Description: Is it a man or an ape? Either way it doesn't seem too friendly.

Name: Will o' the wisp
Description: A strange ball of glowing light. It disappears and reappears and seems to draw you to it. You seem somehow compelled to stand still and watch its strange dancing motion.

Name: Wolf
Description: It howls and snaps at you.

Name: Wood spider
Description: It scuttles towards you.

Name: Wormtongue§ Agent of Saruman
Description: He's been spying for Saruman. He is a snivelling wretch with no morals.

Name: Wyvern
Description: A fast-moving and deadly dragonian animal. Beware its poisonous sting!

Name: Xaren
Description: It is a tougher relative of the Xorn. Its hide glitters with metal ores.

Name: Xorn
Description: A huge creature of the element Earth. Able to merge with its element§ it has four huge arms protruding from its enormous torso.

Name: Yellow mold
Description: It is a strange growth on the dungeon floor.

Name: Yellow mushroom patch
Description: Yum! It looks quite tasty.

Name: Yellow worm mass
Description: It is a large slimy mass of worms.

Name: Yeti
Description: A large white figure covered in shaggy fur.

Name: Yig§ Father of Serpents
Description: A humanoid snake§ Yig is one of the most poisonous entities in existance.

Name: Yog-Sothoth§ the All-in-One
Description: An outer god whose form resembles a mass of great floating globes.

Name: Young black dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a darkest black hue. Acid drips from its body.

Name: Young blue dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a deep blue in hue. Sparks crackle along its length.

Name: Young bronze dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a rich bronze hue§ and its shape masks its true form.

Name: Young gold dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a tarnished gold hue§ and light is reflected from its form.

Name: Young green dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a deep green in hue. Foul gas seeps through its scales.

Name: Young multi-hued dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Beautiful scales of shimmering and magical colours cover it.

Name: Young red dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a deepest red hue. Heat radiates from its form.

Name: Young white dragon
Description: It has a form that legends are made of. Its still-tender scales are a frosty white in hue. Icy blasts of cold air come from it as it breathes.

Name: Zombified human
Description: It is a shambling human corpse dropping chunks of flesh behind it.
